journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Stashkevich, N.S., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute of Plant Protection

abstract.value: In the article the results of studying the herbicide meteor, ES (EHE 2,4-D acid, 300 g/l + florasulam, 6,25 g/l), biological efficiency in winter wheat (Triticum aestivum) and triticale (Triticosecale) crops by autumn and spring application and spring barley (Hordeum vulgare) under conditions of the Republic of Belarus are presented. Based on the results of done researches it is determined that the herbicide applied in winter grain crops in autumn and spring and spring barley at tillering stage at the rates of 0,4-0,6 l/ha is effective against annual dicotyledonous weed plants including the resistant ones from the group 2,4-D and 2M-4X (Galium aparine, Matricaria inodora, Chenopodium album, Stellaria media and etc.). The phytotoxic effect of meteor, ES on cultural crops was not noticed during the researches.
